trans-unit.source: Provides a custom <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> to use for grouping properties that are displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> personalizzato da utilizzare per il raggruppamento delle proprietà visualizzate in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry" /> instance that is checked to determine whether it is included among those properties edited by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry" /> verificata per determinare se è inclusa tra le proprietà modificate da <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines which properties are edited by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.
trans-unit.target: Identifica le proprietà modificate da <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this editor edits the specified property; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'editor modifica la proprietà specificata; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> for which to create a new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> per cui creare un nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: Nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> type for which to create the new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: Tipo <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> per cui creare il nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> type.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" /> per il tipo <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: Nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> that is hosted by the property inspector to provide the user interface for a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> ospitato dal controllo proprietà per fornire l'interfaccia utente di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> user interface.
trans-unit.target: Interfaccia utente di <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" />.

trans-unit.source: The desired <see cref="T.Systems.Windows.Size" /> of the image to return.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T.Systems.Windows.Size" /> desiderato dell'immagine da restituire.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that the host can display in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> che può essere visualizzato dall'host in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to display in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> da visualizzare in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a localized string that indicates to which category the editor belongs.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una stringa localizzata che indica a quale categoria appartiene l'editor.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the editor category.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.String" /> che rappresenta la categoria dell'editor.

trans-unit.source: Category editors are defined on types and, thus, at load time they need to indicate to which category they belong.
trans-unit.target: Gli editor categorie vengono definiti sui tipi e in fase di caricamento devono, pertanto, indicare a quale categoria appartengono.
